name: A Foretold Affair

files.file1: N/A:Please select the itch.io game archive

files.file2: N/A:Please select the outfit select DLC archive

content:
exe: A_Foretold_Affair.sh
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the itch.io game archive
- file2: N/A:Please select the outfit select DLC archive
installer:
- extract:
    file: $file1
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/game
    file: $file2
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/A_Foretold_Affair.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/lib/linux-i686/A_Foretold_Affair
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/lib/linux-x86_64/A_Foretold_Affair
